PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Sensitive
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant growth rate is more reactive to soil fertility

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: blunder free
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: When harvesting this plant, pawns will never fail

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: unsensitive
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant growth rate is less reactive to soil fertility

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: agreeable
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant requires less soil fertility to be sowed

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Regrowing
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Plants are not destroyed after harvest - increases growth after harvest by 1.5x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will not be destroyed after harvest

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Photophobic
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Decreases light requirements to 0%, optimal light to 0%, and makes plant die in any light
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant no longer needs sunlight, rather, it will die when exposed

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: photosynthetic
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Increases light requirements to >51%, optimal light to 100%, and makes plant die without light
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant requires sunlight to grow and will die without it

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: pottable
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Plants can now be planted in pots
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant can now be planted in pots

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Hydroponic
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Plants can now be planted in hydroponics
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant can now be planted in hydroponics

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Polluted
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Allows the plant to either be planted in high pollution levels or any pollution levels
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant can now be planted in polluted enviroments

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Gourmet
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Replaces plant product to the ravitsera fungus and decreases harvest amount by 0.25x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will now grow the ravitsera fungus instead of its original produce

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: Ambrosia
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.desc: Replaces plant product to the Ambrosia fruit and decreases harvest amount by 0.1x
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant will now grow the Ambrosia fruit instead of its original produce

PlantGenetics.TraitDef.label: simple
PlantGenetics.TraitDef.shortdesc: The plant has a less complicated sowing process, allowing less skilled pawns to plant it
